column4: Quick question: How can I run this python script in the background? Im currently using: "python /path/to/script.py" it just runs in the terminal and if I exit terminal the python application stops
How do I list the running processes?
you just type the command in the terminal
thats just a badley written script, pipe the output to /dev/null, and & it
clearly it is if its outputting to the terminal and you don't want it to
no - your not listening, i've told you to nohup it, & it and pipe the output to /dev/null
you have to output the command to /dev/null if you don't want to see the text
